entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Periods of rain or snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening then light before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
